targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") AS "value" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("free") AS "value" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" = 'redis' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" = 'redis' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" = 'redis' AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_idle) as "idle", mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ and  cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /(enp0s3|enp0s8|enp0s9).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /(enp0s3|enp0s8|enp0s9).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /(enp0s3|enp0s8|enp0s9).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /(enp0s3|enp0s8|enp0s9).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /(enp0s3|enp0s8|enp0s9).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /(enp0s3|enp0s8|enp0s9).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /(enp0s3|enp0s8|enp0s9).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(err_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$host/ AND interface =~ /(enp0s3|enp0s8|enp0s9).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host,interface fill(none)
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/ AND "name" =~ /(v|s)d(a|b|c|d)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host"
